text: anriyum allahtan unkalai (mutalil) mannal pataittan; pinnar oru tuli intiriyattiliruntu - pin unkalai (an, pen) jotiyaka avan akkinan, avan ariyamal entap pennum karppam tarippatumillai piracavippatumillai. Ivvare oruvarutaiya vayatu atikamakkappatuvatum, avarutaiya vayatiliruntu kuraippatum (lavhul mahhpul ennum) ettil illamalillai niccayamaka itu allahvukku elitanateyakum
